1.24.21  12:49 pm   When you made the might quit video, did you not believe you would eventually make another song like here comes the sun?

1.24.21  12:32 pm   i have been making music as a hobby since March last year, and I frequently find myself getting attached to the verse chorus verse chorus bridge chorus structure. i have tried really hard to do something different because i am getting really bored of it. whenever i do something different, i'm just not happy with the results. either that, or i get stuck in nowhere. any ideas on how to overcome this?

      also, i dont know a lot of music theory. do you think spending time on learning music theory could help? thanks!
